docs.text: Welcome to PyCharts++ What is PyCharts++? PyCharts++ is a hierarchical data visualization tool built using Python. What is hierarchical data? Hierarchical data is data where items are linked to each other using parent-child relationships. Hierarchical data exhibits a tree-like structure.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: PyCharts++ is a hierarchical data visualization tool built using Python.
docs.title: What is PyCharts++?

docs.text: Hierarchical data is data where items are linked to each other using parent-child relationships. Hierarchical data exhibits a tree-like structure.
docs.title: What is hierarchical data?

docs.text: Charts PyCharts++ supports the following hierarchical chart types. Treemap Icicle Suburst More information about the supported chart types are provided below. Treemap Icicle Sunburst
